tidynhl 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Get a tidy dataset of the NHL entry drafts

Source: R/tidy_draft.R
tidy_draft.Rd

The function tidy_draft() is meant to be a user-friendly way of getting data about the NHL entry drafts.

tidy_draft(
  drafts_year,
  keep_id = FALSE,
  return_datatable = getOption("tidynhl.data.table", TRUE)
)

Arguments

drafts_year

Integer vector indicating which entry drafts will be returned. The first NHL entry draft was held in 1963.
keep_id

(optional) Logical indicating if the IDs of different dimensions should be returned. Default to FALSE.
return_datatable

(optional) Logical indicating whether or not a data.table should be returned. Default can be set globally with options("tidynhl.data.table").

Examples

# Allowing large outputs for the pkgdown website
options(width = 1000L)

# Get the 2020 NHL entry draft
tidy_draft(2020L)

#>      draft_year draft_round draft_pick draft_overall team_abbreviation prospect_fullname
#>   1:       2020           1          1             1               NYR Alexis Lafrenière
#>   2:       2020           1          2             2               LAK   Quinton Byfield
#>   3:       2020           1          3             3               OTT       Tim Stützle
#>   4:       2020           1          4             4               DET     Lucas Raymond
#>   5:       2020           1          5             5               OTT    Jake Sanderson
#>  ---                                                                                    
#> 213:       2020           7         27           213               TOR     Ryan Tverberg
#> 214:       2020           7         28           214               NYI   Henrik Tikkanen
#> 215:       2020           7         29           215               VGK    Maxim Marushev
#> 216:       2020           7         30           216               BUF     Jakub Konecny
#> 217:       2020           7         31           217               TBL  Declan Mcdonnell

# Get both the 2019 and 2020 NHL entry drafts, keeping  the IDs
tidy_draft(drafts_year = 2019:2020, keep_id = TRUE)

#>      draft_year draft_round draft_pick draft_overall team_id team_abbreviation prospect_id prospect_fullname player_id
#>   1:       2019           1          1             1       1               NJD       76849       Jack Hughes   8481559
#>   2:       2019           1          2             2       3               NYR       76511       Kaapo Kakko   8481554
#>   3:       2019           1          3             3      16               CHI       72578        Kirby Dach   8481523
#>   4:       2019           1          4             4      21               COL       72579       Bowen Byram   8481524
#>   5:       2019           1          5             5      26               LAK       72693     Alex Turcotte   8481532
#>  ---                                                                                                                  
#> 430:       2020           7         27           213      10               TOR       82632     Ryan Tverberg   8482525
#> 431:       2020           7         28           214       2               NYI       72778   Henrik Tikkanen   8482472
#> 432:       2020           7         29           215      54               VGK       69859    Maxim Marushev   8482473
#> 433:       2020           7         30           216       7               BUF       82344     Jakub Konecny   8482526
#> 434:       2020           7         31           217      14               TBL       82321  Declan Mcdonnell   8482474
